channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server DBA Tip 14 – SQL Server General – Updating Production Data
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: The best way to learn is to make a mistake, after that you won't make the same mistake again and you will be very careful before doing something crazy on a production database
item.content:encoded: The best way to learn is to make a mistake, after that you won’t make the same mistake again and you will be very careful before doing something crazy on a production database
